channel.title: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2"

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
When can I loop?
what happen if i got my knightmare frame after my loop time appear ? still just at lv.22 ( S3 ) or will change it lv.29 and the loop quest mission will no more until lv.29 or i can wait my loop time until lv.29 when this quest loop time still appear ??
tq

In season 1, you can freely choose to loop any time after one of your attributes (Gen/Nin/Tai) reaches level 20. Once one of them has reached 20, it may no longer level up. This is your level cap. Each of Gen/Nin/Tai can get to 20, thus making your highest available total level 60. If you get the Knightmare Frame, each of your stats cap 5 higher. Your level cap increases by 2 each season, whereas the time you can loop increases by 1 each season.
Season Can loop Level Cap Level Cap with Knightmare Frame
Season 1 20 20 25
Season 2 21 22 27
Season 3 22 24 29
Season X 19 + X 18 + 2X 23 + 2X

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
You got the Knightmare Frame!

huahahhahahaha…… i just write how to pass this mission and i got it for 2nd change.
damn.. stupid random success.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
Value meal jutsu, CAN i use this jutsu and its usefull here for this Doom 2 QUEST mission ?
failed at last mission, DO IT : TAI 17/17.

still cant understand.
RED EYE with cobrakai = str.6, lv.21 + 7, range = 1 - 23 or bankai str.5, lv.21 + 12, range = 1 - 19.
this stat is more than enough if i read the wikidot manual said ( Please note that this mission is exceptionally hard, and without Range at least in the 20's, the chances of success are woefully low. )
jutsu = NONE. why i failed ?

[ Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
argentargent 8 Oct 2008, 14:17 +0700

Is there an easy way to get the range for this with red eye?

Easy-ish. Value Meal is a RedEye only jutsu you can learn while doing BurgerNinja missions that gives +2 range. Pretty much the only jutsu you can use. <=== can i use this jutsu in Doom 2 quest ??? ]

tq

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
"Summons do help.." - only in their appropriate zones, they're like allies in that matter so no summon is going to help in BurgerNinja.
"…i assume so do other potions which state they work on special missions…" - So, that leaves us with 0 potions total that work on special missions.Good looking number.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: Summons do help, and i assume so do other potions which state they work on special missions.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: And, as Ren Po Ken said, may as well get ready to do this misson a few times before passing. Best do do this on a 7 day stream, or when you have plenty stamina to go round.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
Food won't help. Allies don't help. Jutsu except for Value Meal can't help. It's plain and simple your stats vs the mission and the RNG.

Get your levels higher, use Shikai(the extra strength is more useful then the extra levels from Bankai), and pray for luck.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
I'm, having all sorts of probelsm here, I think you can use the food to boost range, str etc, but I need an optimal food choice. Also although I can do the first one, I always seem to fail the second test. It's very odd cos although you can only use burger ninja allies, you do it with normal stats i.e. not doujutsu. Any other tips or possibly a step by step guide of what people did?

Cheers

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
Is there an easy way to get the range for this with red eye?

Easy-ish. Value Meal is a RedEye only jutsu you can learn while doing BurgerNinja missions that gives +2 range. Pretty much the only jutsu you can use.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: That was probably just due to the fact that the person who was having problems at the top wasn't having any problem with the Genjutsu portion, and the EotS and Warrior items that the RedEye bloodline receives are both +Gen range.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
You said 'Non-Red Eye'.
Is there an easy way to get the range for this with red eye?

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: Finally completed this after I ran the numbers and found Shikai to be leaps and bounds better for this mission. Still took me 4 tries.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: Nope. No summons, no Allies, No Jutsu.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: Do summons work in this mission? If you need the regular stats, I would think they might … it's just too bad that one of my characters is Legacy, so it's too much trouble to get started on BurgerNinja with only 1 doujutsu to start.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: Yep… 21% seems more appropriate.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: Yes. You enter 8 in the range box. It's asking for your range bonus.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: I'm not sure. Do I just enter 8 in the Range box?

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: anon 128.113.101.40, did you take into account the fact that the calculator has a base 10 value, and you only tell it your increase in range?

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
curse the RNG, as bad luck is bad luck.
no potions can help special missions.
i beat it using shikai, that might work better for you.

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
Am I using the Calculator wrong? Cause it claims I have a 91% chance of winning this mission; and I've failed 6 or 7 times in a row.

I have 18 Tai Range.

In Bankai, I have 34 levels, 5 Str, and 1 Success. (I have Cobra Kai and Shikai available, should I be using one of them instead?)

Any potion-esque items to give me a boost?

item.title: Re: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded:
I'm going to assume that you are a Season 1 Non-RedEye. I'm going to also assume that you're just looking for range.

Chakra Armor +1 Range - Store if your village has Ninja Arsenal
Duelist's Aura +1 Range - 5000 Arena Reputation
Duelist's Eye +2 Range - 10000 Arena Reputation
Golden Collar of Courage/Power +1 Nin/Tai Range - Lottery. May be a prize in the 2BA Master Special Mission
K-Dog's Headband +1 Range - Prize Wheel (Super Rare)
Letter of Marque +1 Range - Get all season 1 NWW items and do the special mission
Ninja Dog +1 Nin Range - Store if your village has Dog Kennels
Polar Star +2 Range - Monster Drop (Crazed Mimiga), Lottery
Regalia +1 Range - Monster Drop (Storm Riders [enticement only]), Lottery
Sascha +1 Tai Range - Minigun Tuesdays
Storm's Embrace/Fury +2 Nin/Tai Range - Get Eye of the Storm. Which Storm item you get is bloodline dependant.
Twin Bee Pistols +2 Range - Beat Friday Night Fight (Arena Tournament)
Warrior of Courage/Power +1 Nin/Tai Range - Win 15 fights in the arena in one day. Which Warrior item you get is bloodline dependant.

There are (many) other items that increase Range, but they are all Season 2+, increase only Gen range, or is something that is given to you by the mods and can't actually be tried for.

item.title: Shift Manager of Doom! Part 2
item.content:encoded: Can anyone give me hints on a good method of passing this mission? I'm having difficulty hitting the d16 s16 Ninjutsu and the d17 s17 Taijutsu. The Genjutsu is no problem.
